services.name: Physiotherapy Assessment
services.description: Holistic evaluation of physical mobility, strength, and emotional well-being through a psychotherapeutic lens. We'll identify the injury or issue and collaboratively formulate a tailored treatment plan.
includes: May include manual therapy, soft tissue work
Can incorporate shockwave, acupuncture, or Class IV laser (additional Â£45)
services.what_to_bring: Wear shorts or loose clothing if possible (not essential)

services.name: Physiotherapy Follow-Up
services.description: Track progress and adjust treatment plan. Re-evaluate mobility, strength, and overall well-being. Fine-tune interventions for optimal recovery.
includes: Manual therapy, exercises, or advanced techniques as needed
Specialist referrals if needed (surgeon, GP, imaging)

services.name: Prescribing
services.description: Qualified prescribers can prescribe medications when appropriate (e.g., analgesia for pain management).
services.notes: Always designed with safety and effectiveness in mind

services.name: Remedial Rehabilitation
services.description: Expert rehabilitation instructors guide your ongoing recovery. May work in tandem with physiotherapist for coordinated care.
services.notes: Ensures optimal results through expert guidance

services.name: Rehabilitation PT
services.description: Personal training focused on rehabilitation goals.

services.name: Shockwave Therapy
services.description: Targeted sound waves stimulate healing in tissues, reducing pain and promoting recovery. Especially effective for chronic tendon issues.
services.notes: Added to session cost when used

services.name: Class IV Laser Therapy
services.description: Powerful laser light alleviates pain, reduces inflammation, and speeds tissue repair. Reaches deep into the body for advanced healing.
services.notes: Added to session cost when used

services.name: Acupuncture
services.description: Fine needles placed at specific points to balance and stimulate the flow of energy (Qi). Promotes healing, reduces pain, improves overall well-being.
services.notes: May be included in session or separate cost

services.name: Psychotherapy
services.description: Safe space to explore thoughts and emotions using techniques like hypnotherapy and spiritual healing. Reduces stress, enhances mental well-being, fosters coping strategies.

cancellation.policy: Full fee charged if cancelled with less than 24 hours notice

insurance.notes: Patients may claim back from their own insurers. We operate on self-pay model.

common_questions.what_to_wear: Shorts or loose clothing is helpful if you can, but don't worry if you can't.
common_questions.first_visit: Your first visit is a comprehensive assessment. We take a holistic approach looking at physical, emotional, and lifestyle factors.
common_questions.recovery_time: Everyone's recovery is different. We tailor treatment plans to each individual and adjust based on your progress.
common_questions.referrals: If we determine you need a specialist (surgeon, GP, imaging), we facilitate that referral and support your onward care.
